TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MemoryMappedFile extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 表示内存映射文件。

span.span: Represents a memory-mapped file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内存映射文件将文件的内容映射到应用程序的逻辑地址空间。A memory-mapped file maps the contents of a file to an application's logical address space. 内存映射文件使程序员能够处理极其大的文件, 因为内存可以同时进行管理, 并允许对文件进行完整的随机访问, 而无需查找。Memory-mapped files enable programmers to work with extremely large files because memory can be managed concurrently, and they allow complete, random access to a file without the need for seeking. 内存映射文件也可以在多个进程之间共享。Memory-mapped files can also be shared across multiple processes. 方法从磁盘上的现有文件的指定路径或中创建一个内存映射文件。 The methods create a memory-mapped file from a specified path or a of an existing file on disk. 当文件未映射时, 更改会自动传播到磁盘。Changes are automatically propagated to disk when the file is unmapped. 方法创建一个不映射到磁盘上的现有文件的内存映射文件, 并且适用于创建用于进程间通信 (IPC) 的共享内存。The methods create a memory-mapped file that is not mapped to an existing file on disk; and are suitable for creating shared memory for interprocess communication (IPC). 可以将内存映射文件与允许与其他进程共享的内存映射文件的可选名称关联。A memory-mapped file can be associated with an optional name that allows the memory-mapped file to be shared with other processes. 您可以创建内存映射文件的多个视图, 包括部分文件的视图。You can create multiple views of the memory-mapped file, including views of parts of the file. 您可以将文件的同一部分映射到多个地址, 以创建并发内存。You can map the same part of a file to more than one address to create concurrent memory. 若要让两个视图一直处于并发状态，必须通过同一个内存映射文件创建它们。For two views to remain concurrent, they have to be created from the same memory-mapped file. 创建具有两个视图的同一文件的两个文件映射不提供并发性。Creating two file mappings of the same file with two views does not provide concurrency. ## Examples 下面的示例为极大文件的一部分创建内存映射视图，并控制其中一部分。The following example creates a memory-mapped view of a part of an extremely large file and manipulates a portion of it. [!code-csharp[MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateFromFile#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/memorymappedfiles.memorymappedfile.createfromfile/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateFromFile#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/memorymappedfiles.memorymappedfile.createfromfile/vb/program.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `mode`参数适用于磁盘上的源文件。The `mode` parameter pertains to the source file on disk. 如果`capacity`大于磁盘上的文件大小, 则磁盘上的文件将增加以与指定的容量匹配, 即使没有数据写入到内存映射文件也是如此。If `capacity` is larger than the size of the file on disk, the file on disk is increased to match the specified capacity even if no data is written to the memory-mapped file. 若要防止出现这种情况, 请将默认容量指定为 0 (零), 该`capacity`容量在内部设置为磁盘上文件的大小。To prevent this from occurring, specify 0 (zero) for the default capacity, which will internally set `capacity` to the size of the file on disk.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`capacity`大于磁盘上的文件大小, 则磁盘上的文件将增加以与指定的容量匹配, 即使没有数据写入到内存映射文件也是如此。If `capacity` is larger than the size of the file on disk, the file on disk is increased to match the specified capacity even if no data is written to the memory-mapped file. 若要防止出现这种情况, 请将默认容量指定为 0 (零), 该`capacity`容量在内部设置为磁盘上文件的大小。To prevent this from occurring, specify 0 (zero) for the default capacity, which will internally set `capacity` to the size of the file on disk.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法创建一个不是持久的内存映射文件 (即, 不与磁盘上的文件关联), 可以使用该文件在进程之间共享数据。Use this method to create a memory-mapped file that is not persisted (that is, not associated with a file on disk), which you can use to share data between processes. ## Examples 下面的示例由三个单独的进程 (控制台应用程序) 组成`Boolean` , 它们将值写入内存映射文件。The following example is composed of three separate processes (console applications) that write `Boolean` values to a memory-mapped file. 各操作按下面的顺序发生：The following sequence of actions occur: 1. 进程 A 创建内存映射文件, 并向其写入值。Process A creates the memory-mapped file and writes a value to it. 2. 进程 B 打开内存映射文件, 并向其写入值。Process B opens the memory-mapped file and writes a value to it. 3. 进程 C 打开内存映射文件, 并向其中写入值。Process C opens the memory-mapped file and writes a value to it. 4. 处理读取并显示内存映射文件中的值。Process A reads and displays the values from the memory-mapped file. 5. 使用内存映射文件完成处理后, 将立即通过垃圾回收来回收文件。After Process A is finished with the memory-mapped file, the file is immediately reclaimed by garbage collection. 若要运行此示例，请按照以下步骤操作：To run this example, do the following: 1. 编译应用程序并打开三个命令窗口。Compile the applications and open three Command windows. 2. 在第一个命令窗口中, 运行 "处理"。In the first Command window, run Process A. 3. 在第二个命令窗口中, 运行进程 B。In the second Command window, run Process B. 4. 返回以处理, 然后按 ENTER。Return to Process A and press ENTER. 5. 在第三个命令窗口中, 运行进程 C。In the third Command window, run Process C. 6. 返回以处理, 然后按 ENTER。Return to Process A and press ENTER. 进程 A 的输出如下所示:The output of Process A is as follows: ``` Start Process B and press ENTER to continue. Start Process C and press ENTER to continue. Process A says: True Process B says: False Process C says: True ``` **Process A****Process A** [!code-csharp[System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles_IPC_X#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.memorymappedfiles_ipc_x/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles_IPC_X#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.memorymappedfiles_ipc_x/vb/program.vb#1)] **Process B****Process B** [!code-csharp[System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles_IPC_A#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.memorymappedfiles_ipc_a/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles_IPC_A#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.memorymappedfiles_ipc_a/vb/program.vb#1)] **Process C****Process C** [!code-csharp[System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles_IPC_B#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.memorymappedfiles_ipc_b/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles_IPC_B#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.memorymappedfiles_ipc_b/vb/program.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此方法返回的视图来随机访问内存映射文件。You can use the view returned by this method for random access to a memory-mapped file. 若要创建内存映射文件的完整视图, 请将`size`参数指定为 0 (零)。To create a complete view of the memory-mapped file, specify 0 (zero) for the `size` parameter. 如果执行此操作, 视图的大小可能小于或大于磁盘上的源文件的大小。If you do this, the size of the view might be smaller or larger than the size of the source file on disk. 这是因为视图以系统页的单位提供, 视图的大小向上舍入到下一个系统页面大小。This is because views are provided in units of system pages, and the size of the view is rounded up to the next system page size. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个内存映射文件的视图并对其进行编辑。The following example creates a view of a memory-mapped file and edits it. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
